item.title: Post count
item.dc:creator: @Revamp_dis_Shit Revamp dis Shit
item.description:
@Revamp_dis_Shit wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:12, topic:542035”]1: it wasn’t a paragraph.
2: first sentence was answering your question
3: other three sentences were just general statements

post count does not have, nor has ever had any significant meaning. it’s a number which is a mere number which accounts mostly of spam. therefore there’s no reason to judge it, or by it.

post count should be hidden as a whole.[/quote]
Again, who are you writing all this shit for lmao… this is my thread not yours :L

Read full topic

item.title: Post count
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I’m looking into the post count in profiles thing. Though I did intentionally remove the various post count based groups, I don’t believe we should have such divisive names based on post count (junior, senior etc) but I’m fine with the stars staying as a little something (Perhaps they could be redirected to change based on numerous factors in the future).

Read full topic

item.title: Post count
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:12, topic:542035”]post count does not have, nor has ever had any significant meaning. it’s a number which is a mere number which accounts mostly of spam. therefore there’s no reason to judge it, or by it.

post count should be hidden as a whole.[/quote]or we could stop being whiny nerds and realize if its just a number we shouldnt give a damn if its hidden or not

a post count is a STATISTIC, there’s no reason to hide it just like there’s no reason to hide registration date. it’s not a popularity indicator like rep was and other users cant influence it. ive never heard of a forum that hides it and in many many big forums they actually include it in the postbit, they dont hide it from a persons main profile and make you specifically go looking for it. but who gives a shit, im not going to go ask mopar or tom to unhide it because god knows people need to have SOMETHING to complain about

Read full topic

item.title: Post count
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Someone is just mad they couldn’t get their account back.

Post count isn’t really important but it’s still used to judge people, everyone here can say they don’t judge a person by their post count. But sadly they’re lying to you. Just as what happened with rep, post count is just another tool used by us here to pass judgement onto other people who are most likely newer.

Read full topic

after having ~15k posts deleted you tend to forget about post count. I mean, who cares how much you post? have the topics here are derailed or just two people having a stupid ass conversation. there’s no quality information or anything in the topics and post count should be hidden all together.
